name: CFURLPathStyle
desc: Options you can use to determine how CFURL functions parse a file system path name.

items.name: case cfurlposixPathStyle
items.desc: Indicates a POSIX style path name. Components are slash delimited. A leading slash indicates an absolute path; a trailing slash is not significant.

items.name: case cfurlWindowsPathStyle
items.desc: Indicates a Windows style path name.
